title: Color Analysis Tool
description: A comprehensive Python tool for analyzing colors in images, providing detailed information about color distributions, harmonies, and various color space conversions (RGB, HEX, CMYK). Features include single image and batch processing, dominant color detection, color harmony calculations (complementary, analogous, triadic, tetradic), and support for multiple image formats (PNG, JPG, TIFF, WebP, PSD).
notes: This software is designed for designers, artists, and developers working with color analysis and manipulation. It provides comprehensive color analysis including frequency analysis, color space conversions, and color harmony calculations.
